Currently 1,400 hours. This game and I have a strenuous love-hate relationship. Takes a lot of grinding, teammates that are willing to actually win and constant adaptation to your environment based on your rank. Expect to be beaten down hundreds of times by people several times better than you, but as long as you keep your chin up you will eventually reach the top. I'm still on my way there but I hope to get there soon. Be sure to take a break after a competitive match that made you slightly tilted, that becomes exponentially worse the longer you go without a break. 

TL;DR:  Seriously fun but be willing to put time in if you want to "get good".
